summary:
Teacher | Customer Service | Strategy | Customer Focus | Team Manager | Quality Focus | Recruiter | Office Manager I Students I Parents Meeting 

Experience working as a Principal School Director and Office Manager. Assisting executives by providing financial and clerical assistance, while managing customer relationships. Skilled in Customer Support, Budget Control & Planning, Teaching Methods, Administrative Task, and Customer Services.

Strong Customer Oriented Professional, with a bachelor's degree in Modern Languages - Portuguese and Literature (UNIGRANRIO University, Brazil), and a Postgraduation in African and Portuguese literature (URFJ University, Brazil). Fluent in Portuguese, currently studying English, and Dutch Language.

Focus on operations and administrative tasks, to ensure customer needs and requirements are met. Responsible for financial and clerical activities, as well as monthly/annual results, performance reports, and the capacity to work with the public while balancing the interests of all parties involved.

Office Management experience, developing corporate customer relationships, trainings, and invoices. Preserving excellent levels of internal and external customer service, maintaining a safe, secure, and pleasant environment to work. Seeking to develop new partner relationships. Aiming to gain experience in daily operations, staffing, customer support, and finance.

Creating new opportunities for existing and new customers, tracking project metrics, identifying improvements, and best practices for a diverse range of industries. ​Hands-On Experience, focusing on the desired project result. Easy to work on teams, International experience gained by studying with people from various backgrounds, Clear Precise Communicator, Comprehensive, Detail Oriented, and Leadership Skills. Ability to negotiate with clients and partners. ​

🎯Goals: Lead Customer Service Activities; Engage stakeholders at all levels inside and outside of the organization and mentor teams.

💪Relevant Keywords:​
► Customer Service
► Administrative Skills
► Office Management
► School Teacher
EU Visa/ Right to live and work​
Able to relocate
Do not hesitate to contact me
☎️Phone:+ 31 6 537 066 55
📧Email:lucianapantoja@gmail.com
📍Location: Amsterdam, The Netherlands

school.name: Federal University of Rio de Janeiro

company.name: Prefeitura Municipal do Rio de Janeiro

profile_positions.company: Prefeitura Municipal do Rio de Janeiro
profile_positions.description:
• Teaching a variety of disciplines for youths and adults in the public school of Rio de Janeiro.
• Prepare lecture, program and studies materials to a large group of students.
• Presenting lectures discussions to groups, aiming to increase students knowledge or vocational competence.
• Tests grades students on achievement in class.
• Meeting with other professors to enrich students cultural academic backgrounds.
• Conduct workshops demonstrations to teach such skills as sports, math, Portuguese language, and geography.

Education I Youths and Adults I Class I Assignment
profile_positions.title: Adult Education Teacher

profile_positions.company: Prefeitura Municipal do Rio de Janeiro
profile_positions.description:
• Developing new curricula with the help of teachers, students, and other staff
• Build professional relationships with members of the institution and the community.
• Monitoring the progress of new and existing teaching methods.
• Closely evaluating results at the end of each quarter and writing up progress reports.
• Supervising all Prefeitura Municipal do Rio de Janeiro recruitment and vetting prospective teachers.
• Liaise with other departments to ensure the overall strategy of the school.

Exam I Teaching Method I Results I Workshop
profile_positions.title: Principal School Director

profile_positions.company: Prefeitura Municipal do Rio de Janeiro
profile_positions.description:
• Teaching young students of Prefeitura Municipal do Rio de Janeiro and adhering to a daily routine
• Meet with the team to improve the program and eventual needs of a specific child or group of children.
• Consistently devising novel ways to keep children actively engaged.
• Ensuring the child's social and emotional development.
• Create in-depth reports for parents, regular meetings with the Head of Department and the Principal.
• Following the guidelines established by the Education Department and the State of Rio de Janeiro.

Education I Students I Parents I Emotional Development
profile_positions.title: Early Childhood Educator

profile_positions.description:
• Provide financial and clerical assistance to the company.
• Storing transcription and proofreading of records, preparing general Emails, hearings, and workshops.
• Booking meetings, scheduling travel for attorneys, and sending letters to customers.
• Redirect calls when appropriate, answer phone calls, and take notes/messages for associates.
• Keeping track of executive's agendas, by scheduling court depositions, hearings, and other relevant meetings.
• Meeting other team members to assist in the recruitment process.

Legal | Trust | Agenda Coordination | Team Player
